name: Via Magicae
description:
Project 6 for Experimental Game Design, Spring 2023.

Created by: G Li.

How to Play:

  • Use letter key on the keyboard to move your character. Imagine letter G as the center of your screen, and every other letter key as a in-screen position corresponding to their positions on your keyboard.
  • Press the number keys  (1-3) on keyboard to switch between different magical skills. 
  • Press the letter G button to use your current selected skill.
  • All actions consume stamina, so think carefully before pressing!

Known Issues:

  • The game is developed for standard keyboards and a screen resolution of 1920x1080. If the keyboard or screen size is too different, the keys might not represent the screen positions accurately.
